itemDescription: Scottish rugby union and rugby league footballer

wikipedia_page.main: George Douglas (birth unknown – death unknown) was a Scottish rugby union and rugby league footballer.

response: *  George Douglas, for Scotland (RU) while at Jed-Forest RFC (RU) 1921 1-cap (signed for Batley 1921–22)
